snippet.title: Airfix Dogfighter [GAMEPLAY] - PC
snippet.description:
Airfix Dogfighter gameplay from PC.
Airfix Dogfighter gameplay without comment.
#nocommentary

Airfix Dogfighter is a combination of a dynamic arcade game and a simplified flight simulator. As a player you play the role of a pilot of World War II combat aircraft models. The battlefield is an average house with a lot of furniture and everyday things. An interactive three-dimensional environment enables the destruction of these objects and the discovery of objects hidden inside them, which are often mission objectives. The great advantage of the game is certainly a very dynamic action, as well as interesting and diverse missions, after which the pilot can advance and win medals, and a built-in editor that allows you to create your own arenas on which you can fight.
